data.description: An abstract syntax tree for all types of SQL
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module should be listed because it is useful and there is no
    other that does much of what it does. For more details, see the
    recent RFC discussion titled "SQL::AST", as well as the POD
    documentation for SQL::ObjectModel which is currently posted to
    CPAN.
